item.title: Docker 101
item.description: Docker 101 By David Soff Before I start: please clone https://github.com/Davidsoff/docker101 for the hands-on part What is Docker? Lightweight containers Only share the kernel of the host Smaller and quicker to start than VMs typically only runs a single proccess Docker vs VM Architecture How to use Docker? Download it from docker.com building images pt. 1 create a build description in a Dockerfile building images pt.
